p.d: Tina, cleaner at the Federal Palace, is contacted by Djeko, claiming to be her father's friend, who forces her to let one of his men into the office of a manager at Armasuisse. Meanwhile, Kathy Kunz, president of the Confederation, is secretly negotiating the liberation of hostages held in Yemen... Réalisation : Romain Graf (Suisse, 2019) Scénario : Thomas Eggel, Romain Graf, Léo Maillard Distribution : Flonja Kodheli (Tina), Ursina Lardi (Kathy Kunz), Roland Vouilloz (Rainald Mann), Çun Lajçi (Sami), Lisa Chapuisat (Sandra), Arben Bajraktaraj (Djeko), Yoann Blanc (Gaspard), Lucie Zelger (Elsa), Cédric Djedje (Malik), Gaspard Boesch (the informer), Jon Qela (Gazi), Esteban Sicilia (Marco), Fred Polier (Urs Frick), Darius Kehtari (Farouk Sadiki) Genre : policier Awards: best foreign francophone fiction at the 2019 La Rochelle Festival de la Fiction Parental guidance: TV-PG
